publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1495 Christine Grahame: Water and Sewerage Charges—That the Parliament notes that water and sewerage charges have increased by 236% in the last four years whereas the increase in state benefits for the same period is less than 10%; believes that the proposed transitional scheme will not assist those on low incomes who are currently unable to meet these charges, and urges the Scottish Executive to pursue a Water Service Benefit Scheme aligned to the current Council Tax Benefit Scheme. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Linda Fabiani*
